alert.note: Alert for Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tallahatchie and southeastern Quitman Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sumner, or 7 miles east of Parchman, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Tutwiler, Webb, Sumner, Paynes, Vance, Glendora, Distall, Swan Lake, Cascilla, Mikoma, Tippo, Stover, Longstreet, Leverett, Waverly, Whitehead, Brazil, Beaver Dam and Albin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
